post.title: 6 Apps that Will Skyrocket Your Productivity and Creativity

previewContent.subtitle: This month my main focus has been on writing. I streamlined my process more and eliminated the friction points I had before. These are…

paragraphs.name: bd88
paragraphs.text: Photo By Me

paragraphs.name: 737e
paragraphs.text: 6 Apps that Will Skyrocket Your Productivity and Creativity

paragraphs.name: f3b8
paragraphs.text: This month my main focus has been on writing. I streamlined my process more and eliminated the friction points I had before. These are some of the applications that have me do that.

paragraphs.name: fd02
paragraphs.text: Workflowy

paragraphs.name: 5a3a
paragraphs.text:
A simpler way to organize your work - Workflowy
Workflowy offers a simpler way to stay organized. If you have a crazy job or an ambitious project, we will be your…workflowy.com

paragraphs.name: 84d9
paragraphs.text: Workflowy KanBan Board

paragraphs.name: fa02
paragraphs.text: This is the current solution for me when it comes to creating a personal knowledge management system that I use on a daily basis.

paragraphs.name: 6fb5
paragraphs.text: This has led to Aha moments when I have been using it.

paragraphs.name: 6d7f
paragraphs.text: It is minimalist enough in use that I focus on using it instead of over-developing and playing with all the options.

paragraphs.name: 90b2
paragraphs.text: Workflowy allows you to be very flexible in the ontology that you create with it. Along with being flexible in the hierarchy, it allows different views, such as boards, cards, bullets, and to-dos.
Elephas

paragraphs.name: 552e
paragraphs.text:
Elephas - Personal AI Writing Assistant for Mac
Elephas works on all your favorite applications on your Mac, and you don't have to switch windows to write content. How…elephas.app
MenuBar Options

paragraphs.name: d7ee
paragraphs.text: This is an app that sits in your menubar and allows you access to OpenAi GPT API from anywhere on your Mac. Quick grammar check, reply to an email, get a viral tweet suggestion, Outline a post, summarize a page, and so much more.
Command Bar Prompt

paragraphs.name: 601f
paragraphs.text: CleanShot X

paragraphs.name: d17b
paragraphs.text:
CleanShot X for Mac
CleanShot X is the best screenshot and screen recording app for Mac with a built-in annotation tool, Cloud uploading…cleanshot.com

paragraphs.name: cc0d
paragraphs.text: Photo courtesy of CleanShot.com

paragraphs.name: 6a2c
paragraphs.text: This replaces the default screenshot and screen recording of MacOS.

paragraphs.name: 7f84
paragraphs.text: If you want to capture a long page, it will scroll and stitch it together

paragraphs.name: c712
paragraphs.text: an excellent app for annotating screenshots

paragraphs.name: 0edb
paragraphs.text: Light video editing capabilities

paragraphs.name: 3c92
paragraphs.text: Easier than Loom and other screen recorders to use.

paragraphs.name: 4be0
paragraphs.text: One-click publishing of content.
It can add padding and a drop shadow to images.
Powerful Screen recording with features like recording keystrokes, combining your mic output with the output of the computer, and transposing your webcam feed on the screen recording.

paragraphs.name: d0e6
paragraphs.text: You can also use it to make Gifs.

paragraphs.name: ea3a
paragraphs.text: SigmaOS Browser

paragraphs.name: 52e7
paragraphs.text:
SigmaOS
Meet the first browser that organizes your work. One window. Many workspaces. All your tabs. it's free and super easy…sigmaos.com

paragraphs.name: 6e3a
paragraphs.text: Photo courtesy of Sigmaos.com

paragraphs.name: d7ab
paragraphs.text: Webkit-based browser that can use chrome extensions
If you like keyboard shortcuts, then this is your browser. I had been using arc though sigma speeds up everything about browsing. It takes the perspective of treating your tabs like tasks.

paragraphs.name: 63ff
paragraphs.text: When I first started to use it, I thought there would be a big learning curve, and the keyboard shortcuts would get in my way. Boy, was I wrong.

paragraphs.name: bdf7
paragraphs.text: Standout Features include side-by-side windows, your tabs on the side, sub-tabs, command bar, workspaces, tags, and many more.
Akiflow

paragraphs.name: 4d9d
paragraphs.text:
Akiflow - Centralize your schedule
Your unfair advantage at work Connect your tools Connect your favorite tools and take care of all your tasks in one…akiflow.com

paragraphs.name: 988d
paragraphs.text: Great Daily Planner app

paragraphs.name: 0ce4
paragraphs.text: It is one of the only daily planner apps, in my opinion, that could replace a calendar app like Cron for me.

paragraphs.name: 3c28
paragraphs.text: It offers a menu bar menu for upcoming events that allows you to join the video call from there.
You can create one-off and recurring scheduling links to give out to contacts.

paragraphs.name: 972f
paragraphs.text: It will send you notifications to join meetings. When creating a task, it uses NLP to parse out the crucial parts. This, combined with the command bar you can call upon when you are anywhere on your computer, is incredibly powerful.
LittleSnitch

paragraphs.name: 80db
paragraphs.text:
Little Snitch
Products Little Snitch Micro Snitch LaunchBar Internet Access Policy Viewer More Products Shop Support Blog Something…obdev.at

paragraphs.name: 3f29
paragraphs.text: This handy utility will block incoming or outgoing connections.
It allows you to Subscribe to lists that block known ad servers and malware. It can also be used to stop applications from phoning home.

paragraphs.name: fed5
paragraphs.text: You can see a visual map of all the connections around the world your computer is making.

paragraphs.name: 22bb
paragraphs.text: IA Writer

paragraphs.name: 15ef
paragraphs.text:
iA Writer: The Benchmark of Markdown Writing Apps
"For a writing app with a simpler interface [...] check out iA Writer, which has little on-screen clutter like buttons…ia.net

paragraphs.name: 27b3
paragraphs.text: I outline and brainstorm in Workflowy though trying to format a post and export it to medium is a laborious job. Most of the work needs to be done on the Medium drafts page. I had a mental block at first of introducing yet another writing tool. IA writer helps to make the writing process less distracting and formatting, even with images, a breeze. I write up my post, revise it then all I have to do is click publish to medium to have the draft ready. That means all the formatting is only done once instead of twice. It has dramatically improved and made the writing process more enjoyable for me.
If you liked this post, consider following me and clapping for the post! 😁

paragraphs.name: 05b7
